snippet: Novak Djokovic dominated both tiebreakers to beat Jo-Wilfried Tsonga 7-6 (2), 7-6 (2) at the BNP Paribas Open on Friday, setting up a semifinal against Rafael Nadal featuring two players who own a combined seven titles in the California desert....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic dominated both tiebreakers to beat Jo-Wilfried Tsonga 7-6 (2), 7-6 (2) at the BNP Paribas Open on Friday, setting up a semifinal against Rafael Nadal featuring two players who own a combined seven titles in the California desert.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic, Nadal Set for Semifinal Showdown at Indian Wells
headline.main: Djokovic, Nadal Set for Semifinal Showdown at Indian Wells
